strapiPost.title: The Fayetteville Farmers' Market Kicks Off Winter Markets Series
strapiPost.content:
The farmers may be cozied up for the winter, but the market is still open! The Fayetteville Farmers' Market begins its winter markets series this weekend, and as usual, you can shop vendors online for curbside pickup.

  • Inside: Indoor Saturday Markets at the Fayetteville Senior Center take place each weekend, Jan 7 - Mar 11, from 11a-3p, offering seasonal produce, baked goods, handcrafted items, and more.
  • Online: Orders placed on the Online Market each week between Sunday 6p and Wednesday 6a can be picked up curbside at the Fayetteville Public Library each Thursday from 4:30-5:30p.

Find more details in the Fayetteville Flyer HERE.
